title: Master's Dungeon
description: Todd is convinced he has what it takes to be a very good slave. That he has all the qualities Master Mike demands; courage, stamina and love. He just needs to secure a coveted place as one of the full-time slaves in Master Mikeâ€™s dungeon and life will be complete.However, Master Mike has reservations. Can Todd last the course? He devises a strict regime of training that requires an almost superhuman amount of discipline and obedience. Will Todd make the grade or will his services be terminated.
author: Alex Morgan
